DOC.brief_summary: This first study compare laparoscopic sacropexy Pelvic Organs Prolapse Suspension ( POPS ) treat pelvic organ prolapse . This prospective randomized surgical trial design test clinical functional effect two different laparoscopic procedure term anatomical correction prolapse , post-operative long term morbidity , rate recurrence subjective satisfaction patient evaluate quality life questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Sacrocolpopexy Versus POPS Management Pelvic Prolapse
DOC.criteria: Patients required surgical treatment symptomatic pelvic organ prolapse stage â‰¥ 2 without stress urinary incontinence Age > 70 year Severe cardiovascular respiratory disease Pregnancy Previous surgical procedure POP correction
